name: heyform
description: HeyForm is an open source form builder and survey platform. It provides a modern drag and drop interface, logic rules and response analytics, suitable for contact forms, feedback and lead collection in self hosted environments.
features: Drag-and-Drop Builder: Create forms visually by dragging field types onto the canvas.
Conditional Logic: Show or hide questions based on previous answers for dynamic forms.
Response Analytics: View submission data with charts, graphs, and export capabilities.
Multiple Question Types: Support for text, multiple choice, file uploads, ratings, and more.
Custom Branding: Apply your own colors, logos, and styling to match your brand.
Embed Options: Integrate forms into websites or share via direct links.
Notification System: Receive email alerts when new responses are submitted.
Data Export: Download responses as CSV or Excel for further analysis.
